name: Whisker Rescue
description:
Cats, considered by many to be the cutest animal in the world, easy to adore, hard not to like. However, in a world of feline love and friendship between humans and their kittens, not everyone shares that happiness. Many of our four-legged friends suffer injustices and cruelties every day. Fortunately, there are those who struggle to make our blue planet a place free from danger and suffering for our beloved fur balls, and that fighter for feline freedom will be you! Today kittens, in the future, the entire planet.

How to play:

Use the arrows for movement and space for interactions!
Rescue the kittens and punish those who mistreat them!

Game made in 5 days by:

André Monteiro - Programmer & Animator
Gonçalo Quitério - Level Designer
Mariana Rafael - UI Designer
Mariana Sousa - Producer & Researcher
Rui Correia - Artist & Assistant Animator
Rui Lima - Sound Designer
